review: This isn't awesome imo. On the 3rd so called lesson it tells you the guy who created python got the idea from watching a TV show, then you take the "quiz" and the question says he named the program language after a tv show...true or false? The app says the correct answer is true but the language doesn't match. That's not accurate and in using python accuracy is critically important. You'd think an app teaching python would stress on accuracy....especially if they value it over $300 for premium.
replyContent:
Hi Friend,
Thank you for writing to us. We agree that the content should be free but our learners deserve quality content, so we had to hire experts to create it. Reach out to us at hello@codingx.app and we'll definitely reach out to you with a solution that makes you happy.
-Online Institute of Hacking
